description: Event matrix generator for POSSUM simulation in FSL

pulse_sequence.title: Pulse sequence file
pulse_sequence.description: Pulse sequence - all additional files with extensions .posx, .posy, etc., expected to be in the same directory

motion_matrix.title: Motion matrix file
motion_matrix.description: Motion matrix [time(s) Tx(m) Ty(m) Tz(m) Rx(rad) Ry(rad) Rz(rad)]

output_matrix.title: Output main event matrix file
output_matrix.description: Main event matrix [t(s), rf_ang(rad), rf_freq_band(Hz), (4)=rf_cent_freq(Hz), read(1/0), Gx, Gy, Gz(T/m), Tx, Ty, Tz(m), angle_of_rot B(rad), rot_axis Bx, By, Bz(m), angle_of_rot A(rad), rot_axis Ax, Ay, Az(m)]

old_version_flag.title: Old version flag
old_version_flag.description: Allows for the old version of the sorter to run

segment_size.title: Segment size
segment_size.description: Setting the size of the segment of the matrix that is read in one at a time
